sourcesContent:
export const surveyData_en = [
    {
      title: "Company Profile",
      description: "Basic information about your company",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "company_name",
          type: "text",
          label: "Company name (optional)"
        },
        {
          id: "position",
          type: "text",
          label: "Position of respondent",
          info: "e.g. CEO, Process Manager alternatively department"
        },
        {
          id: "industry",
          type: "select",
          label: "Industry",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Manufacturing/Production",
            "Retail/E-Commerce",
            "Logistics/Transport",
            "IT Services",
            "Other Services",
            "Crafts/Trades",
            "Healthcare",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "industry_other",
          type: "text",
          label: "Please specify your industry",
          required: true,
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: "Other" }
        },
        {
          id: "company_size",
          type: "select",
          label: "Company size (number of employees)",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "1-9 employees",
            "10-49 employees",
            "50-249 employees",
            "Over 250 employees"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "revenue",
          type: "select",
          label: "Annual revenue",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Under €2 million",
            "€2 to €10 million", 
            "€10 to €50 million",
            "Over €50 million"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "location",
          type: "text",
          label: "Location(s) (state/states)"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "IT Infrastructure",
      description: "Existing systems and their integration",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "systems",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which systems do you currently use in your company?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "ERP System (e.g., SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, sage)",
            "CRM System (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot)",
            "MES (Manufacturing Execution System)",
            "BI/Analytics Tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau)",
            "Cloud-based Solutions",
            "IoT Devices/Sensors",
            "AI/Machine Learning Applications",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
            id: "systems_other",
            type: "text",
            label: "Please specify your systems (other than the ones listed above)",
            required: true,
            condition: { dependsOn: "systems", value: "Other" }
        },
        {
          id: "integration_level",
          type: "select",
          label: "How would you rate the current integration level of your IT systems?",
          info: "e.g. Fully integrated (all systems communicate seamlessly with each other), Partially integrated (some systems are connected), Barely integrated (isolated solutions, manual data transfer), No integration",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Fully integrated (all systems communicate seamlessly with each other)",
            "Partially integrated (some systems are connected)",
            "Barely integrated (isolated solutions, manual data transfer)",
            "No integration"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "island_solutions_details",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Please describe your isolated solutions in more detail. Which systems are affected and how is data exchanged?",
          info: "Describe systems or affected business processes",
          condition: { dependsOn: "integration_level", value: "Barely integrated (isolated solutions, manual data transfer)" }
        },
        {
          id: "integration_challenges",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What challenges do you see in integrating your systems?",
          options: [
            "Technical complexity",
            "Cost of integration/interfaces",
            "Lack of standards/compatibility",
            "Insufficient expertise",
            "Legacy systems",
            "Data security concerns",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "integration_level", value: ["Partially integrated (some systems are connected)", "Barely integrated (isolated solutions, manual data transfer)", "No integration"] }
        },
        {
          id: "data_storage",
          type: "select",
          label: "Where is your company data primarily stored?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Own servers (on-premise)",
            "Cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)",
            "Hybrid (combination of both)",
            "Predominantly paper-based/in local files"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "paper_based_reasons",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What are the main reasons for paper-based/local data storage?",
          options: [
            "Habit/historically grown",
            "Data privacy concerns",
            "Digitalization costs",
            "Lack of expertise for transition",
            "Specific regulatory requirements",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "data_storage", value: "Predominantly paper-based/in local files" }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Data Usage and Availability",
      description: "Collection and analysis of company data",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "data_types",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What types of data do you systematically collect in your company?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Customer data",
            "Sales/revenue data",
            "Production data",
            "Machine data/sensor data",
            "Logistics/delivery data",
            "Employee data (e.g., working hours, performance metrics)",
            "Website/e-commerce data",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "data_freshness",
          type: "select",
          label: "How current is the data you work with?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Real-time/near real-time (seconds/minutes)",
            "Daily updates",
            "Weekly updates",
            "Monthly updates"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "realtime_data_importance",
          type: "slider",
          label: "How important would real-time data availability be for optimizing your business processes?",
          min: 1,
          max: 10,
          marks: {
            1: "Unimportant",
            5: "Neutral",
            10: "Essential"
          },
          condition: { dependsOn: "data_freshness", value: ["Daily updates", "Weekly updates", "Monthly updates"] }
        },
        {
          id: "data_analysis",
          type: "select",
          label: "How is data analysis predominantly performed in your company?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Automated with specialized analytics tools",
            "Semi-automated (e.g., with Excel analyses)",
            "Manual/sporadic",
            "No systematic analysis"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "manual_analysis_details",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Please describe your manual analysis process in more detail. How often do you analyze data and what tools/methods do you use?",
          condition: { dependsOn: "data_analysis", value: "Manual/sporadic" }
        },
        {
          id: "kpi_tracking",
          type: "select",
          label: "Are KPIs (Key Performance Indicators) systematically recorded and evaluated in your company?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Yes, comprehensively and in real-time",
            "Yes, regularly (daily/weekly)",
            "Yes, but only monthly/quarterly",
            "No systematic KPI tracking"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "kpi_types",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which KPIs do you track regularly?",
          options: [
            "Financial KPIs (revenue, profit, etc.)",
            "Productivity metrics",
            "Quality metrics",
            "Customer-related KPIs",
            "Machine-related KPIs (OEE, downtime, etc.)",
            "Process-related KPIs (cycle times, etc.)",
            "Energy consumption/sustainability",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "kpi_tracking", value: ["Yes, comprehensively and in real-time", "Yes, regularly (daily/weekly)", "Yes, but only monthly/quarterly"] }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Process Automation",
      description: "Level of automation in your company",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "automated_processes",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which of your business processes are already (partially) automated?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Customer management/CRM",
            "Order processing",
            "Production control",
            "Warehouse management/logistics",
            "Accounting/finance",
            "Marketing/sales",
            "Human resources management",
            "Quality assurance",
            "None"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "automation_level",
          type: "slider",
          label: "How would you rate the overall level of automation in your company?",
          required: true,
          min: 1,
          max: 10,
          marks: {
            1: "Barely automated",
            5: "Partially automated",
            10: "Highly automated"
          }
        },
        {
          id: "automation_barriers",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What are the biggest obstacles to more automation in your company?",
          options: [
            "Costs",
            "Process complexity",
            "Lack of expertise",
            "Employee resistance",
            "Inadequate IT infrastructure",
            "Uncertainty about ROI",
            "No management priority",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "automation_level", value: (val) => val && val < 7 }
        },
        {
          id: "decision_making",
          type: "select",
          label: "How are decisions made when process deviations occur (e.g., delivery delays, quality issues)?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Automatically through systems",
            "Semi-automatically (system suggests, human decides)",
            "Manually according to established rules",
            "Ad-hoc/situational"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "ai_acceptance",
          type: "slider",
          label: "How high is the acceptance for AI-supported decisions in your company?",
          min: 1,
          max: 10,
          marks: {
            1: "Very low",
            5: "Neutral",
            10: "Very high"
          },
          condition: { dependsOn: "decision_making", value: ["Automatically through systems", "Semi-automatically (system suggests, human decides)"] }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Potentials and Challenges",
      description: "Identification of optimization potentials",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "process_challenges",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What challenges do you currently see in your business processes?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Excessively long processing times",
            "High error rates",
            "Lack of transparency",
            "Inefficient resource utilization",
            "Delayed response times to problems",
            "Insufficient customer satisfaction",
            "High manual efforts",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "other_challenges",
          type: "text",
          label: "Please describe the other challenges",
          condition: { dependsOn: "process_challenges", value: (val) => val && val.includes("Other") }
        },
        {
          id: "high_manual_efforts",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Please describe in more detail which areas have particularly high manual efforts",
          condition: { dependsOn: "process_challenges", value: (val) => val && val.includes("High manual efforts") }
        },
        {
          id: "transparency_issues",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Please describe in more detail which areas lack transparency",
          condition: { dependsOn: "process_challenges", value: (val) => val && val.includes("Lack of transparency") }
        },
        {
          id: "optimization_areas",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "In which areas do you see the greatest potential for process optimization through real-time data? (Please select the 3 most important)",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Production planning and control",
            "Quality assurance",
            "Maintenance",
            "Inventory optimization",
            "Customer service",
            "Marketing/sales",
            "Personnel planning",
            "Supply chain/logistics optimization",
            "Energy management",
            "Other"
          ],
          maxSelect: 3
        },
        {
          id: "kpi_improvements",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which specific KPIs would you like to improve through process optimization? (Please select the 3 most important)",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Productivity/output per employee",
            "Cycle times",
            "Machine utilization/OEE",
            "Quality rate/scrap rate",
            "On-time delivery",
            "Inventory turnover",
            "Customer acquisition costs (CAC)",
            "Customer lifetime value (CLV)",
            "Customer satisfaction/Net Promoter Score",
            "Energy consumption per product unit",
            "Other"
          ],
          maxSelect: 3
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Innovation Readiness and Resources",
      description: "Assessment of innovation readiness and available resources",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "digitalization_importance",
          type: "select",
          label: "How would you rate the importance of digitalization in your company strategy?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Very high (central strategic priority)",
            "High (important, but alongside other priorities)",
            "Moderate (taken into account)",
            "Low (not a priority)"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "digitalization_projects",
          type: "select",
          label: "Have you conducted digitalization projects in the last 3 years?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Yes, several major projects",
            "Yes, one major project",
            "Yes, but only smaller initiatives",
            "No"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "project_success",
          type: "select",
          label: "If yes, how would you rate the success of these projects?",
          options: [
            "Very successful (exceeded goals)",
            "Successful (achieved goals)",
            "Partially successful (achieved some goals)",
            "Not successful (did not achieve goals)",
            "Cannot evaluate"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "digitalization_projects", value: ["Yes, several major projects", "Yes, one major project", "Yes, but only smaller initiatives"] }
        },
        {
          id: "success_factors",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "What were the most important success factors for your digitalization projects?",
          condition: { dependsOn: "project_success", value: ["Very successful (exceeded goals)", "Successful (achieved goals)"] }
        },
        {
          id: "failure_factors",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "What were the main reasons for the limited success?",
          condition: { dependsOn: "project_success", value: ["Partially successful (achieved some goals)", "Not successful (did not achieve goals)"] }
        },
        {
          id: "management_ai_attitude",
          type: "select",
          label: "How does your management view AI and automated decision-making?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Very receptive and actively driving it forward",
            "Generally positive but waiting",
            "Skeptical, needs convincing",
            "Resistant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "employee_tech_openness",
          type: "select",
          label: "How would you assess your employees' openness to new technologies and process changes?",
          options: [
            "Very open and actively participating",
            "Generally open but with reservations",
            "Rather reserved/skeptical",
            "Resistant/resistance expected"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "digital_budget",
          type: "select",
          label: "What budget could you envision for a project to implement dynamic process intelligence?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Under €10,000",
            "€10,000 - €50,000",
            "€50,000 - €100,000",
            "Over €100,000",
            "Cannot specify"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "internal_resources",
          type: "select",
          label: "What internal resources are available for digitalization projects?",
          options: [
            "Dedicated IT department with relevant expertise",
            "Individual IT staff",
            "Subject matter experts with IT affinity",
            "No specialized resources"
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Industry-Specific Questions",
      description: "Specific questions depending on company type",
      questions: [
        // Manufacturing companies
        {
          id: "manufacturing_type",
          type: "select",
          label: "What type of manufacturing do you predominantly operate?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Mass production",
            "Series production",
            "Small-batch production",
            "One-off production",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        {
          id: "production_monitoring",
          type: "select",
          label: "How are your production facilities currently monitored?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Complete digital monitoring in real-time",
            "Partial digital monitoring",
            "Manual monitoring with regular checks",
            "Only in case of problems/reactive",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        {
          id: "maintenance_approach",
          type: "select",
          label: "How is the maintenance of your production facilities predominantly carried out?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Predictive maintenance",
            "Condition-based maintenance",
            "Scheduled interval maintenance",
            "Reactive maintenance (upon failure)",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        // Maintenance questions (dynamically added)
        {
          id: "maintenance_costs",
          type: "select",
          label: "How high do you estimate the share of maintenance costs in your total operating costs?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Under 5%",
            "5-10%",
            "11-15%",
            "16-20%",
            "Over 20%",
            "Cannot specify"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        {
          id: "maintenance_concept",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which maintenance concepts do you currently use?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Reactive maintenance (repair after failure)",
            "Preventive maintenance (according to schedule)",
            "Predictive maintenance (condition-dependent)",
            "Prescriptive maintenance (AI-supported)",
            "Total Productive Maintenance (TPM)",
            "Reliability Centered Maintenance (RCM)",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        {
          id: "maintenance_challenges",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What are the biggest challenges in your maintenance?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Unplanned downtime",
            "High maintenance costs",
            "Lack of skilled personnel",
            "Spare parts management",
            "Lack of data/transparency",
            "Inadequate documentation",
            "Equipment complexity",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Manufacturing/Production", "Crafts/Trades"] }
        },
        
        // Service companies
        {
          id: "customer_channels",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which customer interaction channels do you use?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Personal consultation",
            "Telephone",
            "Email",
            "Website/online shop",
            "Chat/chatbot",
            "Social media",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Retail/E-Commerce", "IT Services", "Other Services", "Healthcare"] }
        },
        {
          id: "feedback_analysis",
          type: "select",
          label: "How is customer feedback collected and analyzed?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Systematically and evaluated in real-time",
            "Regularly collected and evaluated",
            "Sporadically/occasionally collected",
            "No systematic collection",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: ["Retail/E-Commerce", "IT Services", "Other Services", "Healthcare"] }
        },
        
        // Logistics companies
        {
          id: "logistics_tracking",
          type: "select",
          label: "How are shipments/vehicles tracked?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Real-time tracking with permanent status updates",
            "Step-by-step tracking at defined points",
            "Manual status updates by staff",
            "No systematic tracking",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: "Logistics/Transport" }
        },
        {
          id: "route_planning",
          type: "select",
          label: "How is route planning done in your company?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Dynamic and automated (considering real-time traffic data)",
            "Static with manual adjustments when needed",
            "Completely manual and experience-based",
            "Not applicable"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "industry", value: "Logistics/Transport" }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Implementation Strategies",
      description: "Preferences for implementation",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "implementation_approach",
          type: "select",
          label: "Which implementation approach would be most suitable for you?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Comprehensive solution for the entire company",
            "Area-specific solutions (e.g., production only)",
            "Pilot project with later expansion",
            "Step-by-step introduction starting with critical processes"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "software_preference",
          type: "select",
          label: "Do you prefer standard software solutions or customized developments?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Standard software (SaaS/Cloud)",
            "Customized standard software",
            "Custom development",
            "Hybrid approach (combination)"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "quick_implementation",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important is a quick implementation to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "low_initial_cost",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important are low initial costs to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "integration",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important is good integration with existing systems to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "scalability",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important is scalability/expandability to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "ease_of_use",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important is ease of use/low complexity to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "data_security",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important are data security/data protection to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "data_location",
          type: "select",
          label: "How important is the location of data storage (Germany/EU) to you?",
          options: [
            "Very important",
            "Important",
            "Less important",
            "Unimportant"
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Expectations and ROI",
      description: "Expectations for implementing dynamic process intelligence",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "primary_goals",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What primary goals do you pursue with the implementation of dynamic process intelligence? (Please select the 3 most important)",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Cost reduction",
            "Efficiency improvement",
            "Quality improvement",
            "Increased customer satisfaction",
            "Faster responsiveness",
            "Better decision-making basis",
            "Employee workload reduction",
            "Competitive advantages",
            "Enable new business models",
            "Other"
          ],
          maxSelect: 3
        },
        {
          id: "expected_roi",
          type: "select",
          label: "What ROI (Return on Investment) do you expect from such a project?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "ROI within 6 months",
            "ROI within 1 year",
            "ROI within 2 years",
            "ROI within 3+ years",
            "No specific ROI expectations"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "productivity_improvement",
          type: "range",
          label: "What productivity increase (in %) do you expect from real-time process intelligence?",
          required: true,
          min: 0,
          max: 100,
          step: 5
        },
        {
          id: "error_reduction",
          type: "range",
          label: "What error reduction (in %) do you expect?",
          min: 0,
          max: 100,
          step: 5
        },
        {
          id: "cycle_time_reduction",
          type: "range",
          label: "What cycle time reduction (in %) do you expect?",
          min: 0,
          max: 100,
          step: 5
        },
        {
          id: "cost_reduction",
          type: "range",
          label: "What cost reduction (in %) do you expect?",
          min: 0,
          max: 100,
          step: 5
        },
        {
          id: "revenue_increase",
          type: "range",
          label: "What revenue increase (in %) do you expect?",
          min: 0,
          max: 100,
          step: 5
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Barriers and Support Needs",
      description: "Identification of obstacles and support opportunities",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "main_barriers",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What main barriers do you see in implementing dynamic process intelligence?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "High investment costs",
            "Lack of internal expertise",
            "Integration with existing systems",
            "Data protection/IT security concerns",
            "Acceptance issues among employees",
            "Unclear ROI/economic efficiency",
            "Insufficient process standardization",
            "Lack of time",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "support_needs",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "In which areas do you need support for implementation?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Strategy development/roadmap",
            "Process analysis and optimization",
            "Selection of suitable technologies",
            "Technical implementation",
            "Data protection/IT security",
            "Change management/employee qualification",
            "Funding advice",
            "Economic efficiency calculation/ROI analysis",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "support_format",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "What form of support would you prefer?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Individual consulting/coaching",
            "Workshops for employees",
            "Implementation support from experts",
            "Networks for experience exchange with other companies",
            "Webinars/online courses",
            "Written guidelines/best practices",
            "Other"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "funding_knowledge",
          type: "select",
          label: "Are you aware of funding opportunities for digitalization projects?",
          options: [
            "Yes, we already use them",
            "Yes, but we don't use them",
            "No, but we are interested",
            "No, not interested"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "used_funding",
          type: "multiselect",
          label: "Which funding programs do you use or have you already used?",
          options: [
            "Digitalbonus Bayern",
            "go-digital (BMWi)",
            "Digital Jetzt",
            "ZIM (Central Innovation Program for SMEs)",
            "KfW funding",
            "Regional funding programs",
            "EU funding programs",
            "Other"
          ],
          condition: { dependsOn: "funding_knowledge", value: "Yes, we already use them" }
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      title: "Final Questions",
      description: "Plans and additional comments",
      questions: [
        {
          id: "implementation_plans",
          type: "select",
          label: "Are you planning concrete projects in the area of dynamic process intelligence/real-time data in the next 12-24 months?",
          required: true,
          options: [
            "Yes, definitely",
            "Probably yes",
            "Rather not",
            "Definitely not",
            "Still undecided"
          ]
        },
        {
          id: "planned_projects",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Please briefly describe your planned projects",
          condition: { dependsOn: "implementation_plans", value: ["Yes, definitely", "Probably yes"] }
        },
        {
          id: "additional_topics",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "What other topics related to dynamic process intelligence are you particularly interested in?"
        },
        {
          id: "final_comments",
          type: "textarea",
          label: "Do you have any final comments about the survey?"
        }
      ]
    }
 ];
